links.title: Samsung must pay Apple $539 million in iPhone patent case
links.description: Samsung Electronics Co. must pay Apple Inc. $539 million for infringing patents related to the iPhone's design, a federal jury found Thursday, a new victory for Apple in a seven-year-old legal battle over the spoils of the smartphone market's boom.
